name: canemap
description: CaneMap is a comprehensive digital platform designed for managing sugarcane fields, tracking farming activities, and facilitating communication between farmers, landowners, and SRA (Sugar Regulatory Administration) officers.

scripts.build:android: cd android && chmod +x gradlew && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && npm run copy:apk
scripts.build:full: npm run build && npm run build:android && npm run copy:apk
scripts.rebuild:android: npm run clean:android && npm run build:android
scripts.sync:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npm run copy:apk
scripts.setup:android:manual: echo 'To set up Android SDK manually, run: bash setup-android-sdk.sh'
